css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u{padding-top:25px;padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-left:20px;border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:2px;min-width:initial;height:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);flex-direction:column;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:2px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:0px;bottom:0px;left:-2px;right:-2px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0d041ea2-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-right-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;left:0px;right:0px;}}
